level.heading: Change in ownership or operation.
level.text: A nurse staffing agency shall notify the Department of any change in ownership, or in business name, address, telephone number, or responsible party, as required by ยง 44-1051.04, no later than 30 days after the change.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-74
level.text: For Law 15-74, see notes following ยง 44-1051.02.
